shrimp.name: IndirectDiffuse
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: minsamp
input.description: Minimum number of samples to use

input.name: hitsides
input.description: Side of surface to consider by a ray hit

shrimp.usage: Indirect diffuse retrieves the diffuse illumination from indirect light, allowing effects such as color bleeding. Coneangle defaults to PI/2. Distribution can be one of cosine or uniform, defaults to cosine. Can use an optional environment map to use when rays don&apost hit the geometry. You can also use point-based indirectdiffuse. Note that this shadeop varies considerably from implementation to implementation, so please consult your renderer's documentation for details. This block passes the indirect diffuse value into aov_indirectdiffuse, and the optional occlusion value into aov_occlusion AOV presets (as occlusion, not 1 - occlusion).
